tests.name: Half Adder
tests.setup: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y iverilog
tests.run: iverilog -o sim.vvp rtl/halfadder.v tb/halfadder_tb.v && vvp sim.vvp | tee output.txt && grep -q 'TEST PASSED' output.txt
